name: Master Show VR
summary:
Two game modes: Stage simulator & Stage defender

36 characters to create your stage.
9 musicians with these instruments: electric guitar, drums, bass guitar, music keyboard, piano, violin, bongo drum, trumpet and saxophone.

18 singers of different styles in two genres, female and male.
K-pop, pop, classic pop, rap, reggae, ballad, rock, guitarist and pianist.

9 fun dancers and chorus girls to set the stage:
Dancing girl, dancing boy, bear, happy face, led costume, female choir, male choir, mysterious...
